content:
capability table
capability_id                 name             description                                                                                                                              entity
--------------------------  ------------------------  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
fcc3bdc5901b4a1499808c7b85  Hardware Repair           Describes the process of repairing or replacing faulty hardware components on a device.                                                           003145a72e4140d6a81cd967db, fd594156ae9b4ddcb2e3ca719c, 4aacc788390a44489115604ae2
ddf4bd4ce4974de0900951be0d  Software Troubleshooting  Help with diagnosing and resolving issues with software applications, including identifying and fixing bugs, errors, and compatibility problems.  e7bd5c12260b4073ab97aa56c7, 2884109af2af4f6f9b5b2dca74, 71157eb61782453fa3ad27261c
7d517068c8e844589952cdbc47  Slow Performance          Describes the issue of a device performing slowly and possible solutions.                                                                         4f828c531d3a4385905030ed6a, 538bd3f6c3b84fe0b0fe93cc2b, 25234c911aab4edda7b872ae3c, 46894d3587614e0dbc93f15d90, ccd261f31aea4962833723675d
270dc2db9db54ec7bf2c6c43d7  Software Updates          Refers to the process of updating the device's operating system or apps to the latest version.                                                    8f1690d7238c48d6b9fbaa1b40, 7788d9fa96964bf5ad1e46c088



slot table
slot_id                   slot_name       description                                                                 examples
--------------------------  ----------------  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
003145a72e4140d6a81cd967db  brand             The brand of the laptop requiring repair.
fd594156ae9b4ddcb2e3ca719c  model             The specific model of the laptop requiring repair.
4aacc788390a44489115604ae2  part              The hardware component that needs repair.                                          screen, keyboard, battery, hard drive, RAM, fan
e7bd5c12260b4073ab97aa56c7  software_name     The name of the software that is causing trouble.                                  Microsoft Word, Adobe Reader, Google Chrome, Zoom, Slack
2884109af2af4f6f9b5b2dca74  problem_type      The type of problem encountered with the software.
71157eb61782453fa3ad27261c  error_message     The exact error message displayed by the software.                                 Cannot open because of an error, The application has stopped working, Adobe Acrobat unexpectedly quit, Google Chrome has crashed, Zoom not responding, Slack has encountered an issue
4f828c531d3a4385905030ed6a  brand             The brand of the laptop experiencing slow performance.
538bd3f6c3b84fe0b0fe93cc2b  model             The model of the laptop experiencing slow performance.
25234c911aab4edda7b872ae3c  operating_system  The operating system installed on the laptop experiencing slow performance.        Windows, macOS, Linux
46894d3587614e0dbc93f15d90  memory            The amount of memory (RAM) installed on the laptop experiencing slow performance.
ccd261f31aea4962833723675d  storage           The type of storage installed on the laptop experiencing slow performance.
8f1690d7238c48d6b9fbaa1b40  software_name     The name of the software to update.
7788d9fa96964bf5ad1e46c088  update_type       The type of update to perform.
